# Review: Convolutions

## Math

> discrete convolution

$$(f * g)[n] = \displaystyle\sum_{m = -\infty}^{\infty} f[m]g[n-m]$$

> continuous convolution

$$(f * g)(t) = \displaystyle\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} f(\tau)g(t-\tau) \, d\tau$$

## Spatial Convolution

![spatial convolution](convolution_animation.gif)

* image source: [spatial-lang.org](https://spatial-lang.org/conv)

## Max Pool

![max pool](cnn_max_pool.png)

* image source: [Dhanush Kumar](https://medium.com/@danushidk507/max-pooling-ef545993b6e4)

## Edge Detection

> first derivative

$$f'(x) = \lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f(x + h) - f(x)}{h}$$

> second derivative

$$\begin{array}{rcl}
  f''(x) & \approx & \frac{\frac{f(x + h) - f(x)}{h} - \frac{f(x) - f(x-h)}{h}}{h} \\
  ~ & = & \frac{f(x + h) - 2f(x) + f(x - h)}{h^{2}} \\
\end{array}$$

![edge detection](Edge-detection-filters-in-edge-detection-layers.png)

* image source: [Jaemin Jeong, et al](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/348490048_Filter_combination_learning_for_CNN_model_compression)
